subject: resource/Rygar:_The_Legendary_Adventure
object: Rygar: The Legendary Adventure, released in Japan as Argus no Senshi (アルゴスの戦士), is a console game for the PlayStation 2 first released in November 2002. It is based on the original Rygar released for arcade machines and various consoles. The new features are a transition to 3D graphics and portions of the environment are destructible. It was released to generally positive reviews.
